column5: Will be down there for the Sept long weekend, I've never fished out there. Normally I fish Lake O or Georgian Bay.  Where should I go for Walleye or Bows? I have a boat, capable of deep water trolling. I've never fished the western Lake E basin, not sure on depths, patterns etc.  Any general tips?
I was in the area sat.  Most boats out of wheatler were heading out for bows.  Im sure if you go to the marina in wheatley you will get lots of help as where to go.
http://www.michigan-sportsman.com/forum/sh...ad.php?t=300605  has a lot of info from a trip 8/23
Drive down the road 1/2 hour and go out of Wheatly not Leamington.  Bows should be running, you will see the crowd and will get direction from someone at the docks.
